column1: Keep it disabled if you have a big number of products.
column2: Keep it disabled if you have a big number of products.

column1: According to the category display mode
column2: According to the category display mode

column1:
A comma-delimited list of links and link labels to append to the sitemap.
    Example:
Link without 'http[s]://' as 'customer/account/,Customer Account'
will be converted to 'http[s]://(store_URL_here)/customer/account/'
Link with 'http[s]://' will be added as it is.
column2:
A comma-delimited list of links and link labels to append to the sitemap.
    Example:
Link without 'http[s]://' as 'customer/account/,Customer Account'
will be converted to 'http[s]://(store_URL_here)/customer/account/'
Link with 'http[s]://' will be added as it is.

column1: Note: the trailing slash can be added to pages without suffix .html or .htm
column2: Note: the trailing slash can be added to pages without suffix .html or .htm
